Quantify the narrative with ranges where possible (Ford Q2 margin 4.3%, ROIC 10.1%, EV loss $1.3B; Disney price point $30/mo; WH Smith -40%; J&J investment magnitude; personal-loan rate ranges in C3ODMIQKZ) and keep the structure tight: first-principles anchors, regime map, transmission channels, base case, catalysts/invalidation, watchlist, and confidence.
